siteInfo.name: EpoxyEdgeZZ
siteInfo.description: EpoxyEdgeZZ is a family run business based in Sligo, Ireland. We specialise in creating bespoke resin furniture and homeware. We also offer a range of other services including resin flooring, resin countertops, resin wall art and more.

HOME.name: Home
HOME.title: Home
HOME.description: EpoxyEdgeZZ is a family run business based in Sligo, Ireland. We specialise in creating bespoke resin furniture and homeware. We also offer a range of other services including resin flooring, resin countertops, resin wall art and more.

ABOUT.name: About
ABOUT.title: About Us
ABOUT.description: Learn more about our history, values, mission, and more. We are a collection of people who hold similar ideals.

GALLERY.name: Gallery
GALLERY.title: Product Gallery
GALLERY.description: Browse our gallery of past projects. We have a wide range of projects from resin furniture to resin flooring.

PRIVACY.name: Privacy
PRIVACY.title: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.description: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and store your data. We take your privacy very seriously.

CONTACT.name: Contact
CONTACT.title: Contact Us
CONTACT.description: Get in touch with us today to discuss your project. We are always happy to help.
